domain.name: Entertainment Personality
domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings

text:
@DrOz Please provide the public with a list of sponsors that support your television program.  I would be interested to know which corporations support your view that 2-3% of school children dying of COVID-19 would be a "...very appetizing opportunity".

Doctor indeed.
